data.title: John & Yoko Atop Charts as Anniversary of Lennon's Death Passes
data.meta_description: Dec 8, 2023 - Lennon, the music icon who lived in the Dakota on West 72nd Street, has been making headlines around the 43rd anniversary of his death.
data.text:
Dec 8, 2023 - It's the 43rd anniversary of the death of John Lennon, who was shot and killed outside his apartment building on the corner of West 72nd Street and Central Park West.

Last week, one of his songs titled "Happy Xmas (War Is Over)," reappeared within Billboard’s top-10 rock-streaming songs and is expected to continue to climb the charts through the holiday season.

The track was released in 1971 with wife Yoko Ono, not with the Beatles.

Read the original article here.
